title: Citrus & Herb Chicken
description: A flavorful and spicy chicken curry with coconut milk.
steps: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions and garlic until soft.
Add the chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in the curry powder and mix well.
Pour in the coconut milk and let it simmer for 15 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper, then serve with rice.

title: Grilled Salmon with Lemon
description: A healthy and delicious grilled salmon dish with lemon zest.
steps: Preheat the grill to medium heat.
Brush the salmon fillets with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Place lemon slices on top of the salmon.
Grill for 5-7 minutes on each side until cooked through.
Serve with a side of steamed vegetables.

title: Vegetarian Stir Fry
description: A mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and tofu.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
steps: Heat sesame oil in a pan and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add the mixed vegetables and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes.
Add tofu and soy sauce, then cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Serve hot over rice or noodles.
